dict.string: Bluetooth is used to communicate with BLE devices so that the app can connect to your car and update positioning parking restrictions information while the app runs in the background.
Bluetooth is used to communicate with BLE devices so that the app can connect to your car and inform you about positioning parking restrictions.
Location is needed in order to update your gps location and determine your proximity to your car and parking spots around the city while the app is open
Location is needed in order to update your gps location and determine your proximity to your car and parking spots around the city while the app runs in the background
